content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/" xmlns:moz="http://www.mozilla.org/2006/browser/search/">  <ShortName>ARKive Search</ShortName>  <Description>Search for ARKive species and content</Description>  <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding>  <Image width="16" height="16" type="image/x-icon">http://www.arkive.org/favicon.ico</Image>  <Url type="text/html" method="GET" template="http://www.arkive.org/?quicksearch={searchTerms}&OpenSearch=true"></Url> </OpenSearchDescription>
